title.rendered: Empowering Women Globally: SolBox Subscription Offers Additional 15% Discount for the New Year

content.rendered:
Empowering Women Globally – NiyamaSol.com

Niyama Sol – activewear brand dedicated to empowering women, announces a special promotion for its exclusive SolBox subscription service.

LAS VEGAS, NEVADA, UNITED STATES, December 11, 2023 /EINPresswire.com/ — Niyama Sol, the activewear brand known for its commitment to empowering women through sustainable and stylish fitness apparel, is excited to announce a special promotion for its exclusive SolBox subscription service.

The SolBox subscription service offers customers a convenient and personalized way to receive Niyama Sol’s latest collections and limited edition pieces. Each SolBox is curated with handpicked items based on the customer’s style preferences and size, making it the perfect way to discover new and unique pieces from the brand.

To celebrate the launch of the SolBox subscription service, Niyama Sol is offering a special promotion for new subscribers. For a limited time, customers can use code NEWYEAR15 to receive 15% off their first SolBox when they sign up for a monthly or quarterly subscription. This promotion is the perfect opportunity for fitness enthusiasts to refresh their workout wardrobe with sustainable and stylish pieces from Niyama Sol.

Niyama Sol’s SolBox subscription service is now available for sign-up on their website. With this special promotion, customers can experience the brand’s commitment to empowering women while discovering new and unique pieces from their sustainable and stylish collections. Don’t miss out on this limited time offer and join the Niyama Sol community today.

About Niyama Sol:

Niyama Sol is a brand that goes beyond activewear; it’s a lifestyle committed to empowering women to lead healthy, active, and sustainable lives. With a focus on quality, style, and environmental responsibility, Niyama Sol is a brand that resonates with those who believe in the power of self-expression through fitness.

Note: Offer valid from Dec. 6th to Dec. 31st 2023.

Gabriella Forte
Niyama Sol
gabriella@niyamasol.com
Visit us on social media:
Instagram
TikTok
Facebook

You just read:

News Provided By

December 11, 2023, 17:00 GMT
